post_title: SOLD: HOFer Frank Chance red portrait, PSA...
post_content:
Nice looking card, graded PSA AA.

It is $SOLD postpaid in the continental U.S. Payment via PayPal "gift", personal check, bank check, or money order. Commitment to purchase outweighs any inquiries.  :eek:

References available on inquiry. I've been on net54 since 2009 and have transacted business with many, many collectors over the years.

Please send me a PM if interested.

Other T206 HOFers and prewar cards:

[url]www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]
